item.description: I’m a Computer Science Engineer MSc majored in Software Engineering and with a minor in Enterprise Information Systems. For years I’ve been working as an EAI and Order Management Consultant for Novabase/Celfocus in the Telco market mainly for Vodafone OpCos with roles spanning from Development, Functional and Technical Analysis, Architecture, Team Leading and Production Acceptance mostly in the BSS stack but with some dips into OSS. You can find my up-to-date resum√© on Linkedin.
